column1: length ball right on off stump, and seaming away after hitting the deck. Wade chooses to defend first up, tapped back to Lalor off the back foot
full on middle, and clipped away to square leg. He wants to get off the mark, so it's a tight single. Nice pick-up-and-throw from Steketee at midwicket, and Wade was gone if that was a direct hit
length ball outside off, and punched away from his body to cover. Intercepted

length ball, wide enough outside off, and Short slashes hard at a cut shot to beat the men inside the circle. The grass is slightly slow due to the rain, so he pulls it back before the ball reaches the boundary
length ball outside off, but angling into Short. Tapped off the back foot past Wade to mid on
good length on middle, and nudged off his hips to deep midwicket. They jog across for one
round the wicket to Wade. Length ball on middle, and fended back to Mujeeb off the back foot
full on leg, and flicked away past the fielder at midwicket for a single. Wade wants two, but quick work in the deep ensures he cant
length ball on middle, and Wade backs away to try and cut this behind square. But it's too close to his body. Mistimed to cover
uses his feet again to splice a cut shot that's too close to his body. Played from outside leg stump, and squirts this juuust past the diving Swepson at point
slower through the air, length ball on middle, and clipped off his hips to the leg side
b>through to the keeper! Slider on middle that whizzes straight through. Wade backs away to cut again, but extra bounce takes it over his bat
full on off, and drilled by Short! Straight past the bowler's left, and the umpire gets away from the ball's way too. Races away to the long-on boundary
ball stays low! And that's hurt Short. Here's hoping he's wearing a box. Length ball angling in, and Short looked to pull square. But he's taken a blow where he wouldn't have liked to
length ball juuust outside off stump, and Short bends his knees to cut. But mistimed to point
length ball sliding down leg, and that's been nudged away behind square. But he can't find the gap as the ball goes to short fine-leg on the bounce
up and over! Slower ball (112kph) and Short sees that like a watermelon. Clears his front leg, and eases a straight lofted shot over the non-striker's head. Just over the boundary
drops his length this time. Length ball on middle, and he clips this fine past the infielder for four more! Expensive from Lalor this time, and Short did well to play the field he was set
full outside leg stump, and he's down on one knee to sweep. Mistimed to short fine leg
length ball on middle and angling into the batsman. Backs away to tap this down the ground to long on
length ball on middle, and straightening after pitching. Rocks onto the backfoot, and nudges it towards the leg side
shouts of 'catch it', but the ball lands in front of Mujeeb. Length ball on middle, and tapped back towards Wade. Mujeeb misses, and the ball goes to long on for a single
sliced to point! And that's his 50th T20 wicket. Length ball on leg after he saw Wade backing away, and the cut shot has popped into the air for an easy dismissal
over the wicket to the new batsman. Slider outside off that whizzes into his body. Looks to muscle this towards the leg side, but inside-edges it onto his body
length ball just outside off, and cut off the back foot to to deep point
length ball outside off, and the ball stays low! Doolan adjusts to defend, but the outside edge flies away to third man
length ball on leg stump, and angled into his body. Defended off the back foot to Steketee
hammered! Back of a length on middle, and Short clears his front leg, then opens his chest, and finally baseball-swings it over deep midwicket. Whattay shot

length ball outside off, and angling further away. Slower ball from Steketee, so the ball stays low. Short lines up to cut, but the ball goes past his bat. Through to the keeper on the bounce, but the umpire calls it a wide
length ball just outside off, and Short slaps a cut shot in front of square. Chase for the fielders, and Heazlett's work in the deep ensures Heat save one run
back of a length just outside off, and fended off the back foot to Steketee
full on leg stump, and nudged away off his pads to short fine leg. Nice, early call for the single
length ball wide outside off, and spinning inwards. Muscled towards mid on off the back foot
good length outside off, and that's been cut through the infield! Pierces the gap, and races away to the backward-point boundary
bowled him! Full outside off, and the wrong'un slides through Doolan's attempt at an expansive cover drive. Mujeeb is pumped
good length on middle, and flicked off his hips to short fine leg
full on leg and D'Arcy Short misses the leg-side flick. Hits his pad, but impact is outside the stumps
full on middle, and he clips it away off the front foot to the vacant midwicket region
full on middle, and driven against the spin to Cutting at cover
full on middle, and defended with soft hands
half-tracker on off stump and zipping through. Punched firmly off the back foot to cover
back of a length on middle, and he goes deep into the crease to complete a pull shot over deep midwicket! Man riding the boundary-line, but a gutsy shot from McDermott earns him maximum rewards
full just outside off stump, and confidently defended back to Swepson
slower ball, full on middle. Through the drive too early, so he pre-hits the shot to long off
length ball just outside off, and he softly turns the ball towards the vacant mid-wicket region for a walking single
length ball on middle, and pulled along the ground to deep midwicket. In the slot to be punished, but hit straight towards the fielder
full and wide outside off, and he waits for the ball to come to him before steering a square drive to the fielder at backward point
length ball on off, and he tiptoes to ride the bounce. Nudged to midwicket off the back foot
full outside off, and Short wants to slap the leather off this ball. Lines up to cut this behind square, but misses the shot completely. Looks at his bat in dismay
full toss, and the batsman wasn't expecting that. Drilled to long on for a walking single
full toss just outside off again, and this time Short comes skipping down the ground. Smashes the ball right past Swepson's left to long on
length ball outside off, and he cuts this skidder to deep backward point
length ball outside off, and spinning further away. Short backs away to cut, but he can't reach the ball
length ball outside off again, and the ball is cut square to deep point by Short
full on middle, and Short uses his feet to reach the pitch of the ball. Firmly driven past the diving Swepson's left to long on
back of a length outside off, and Short tries to steer a late cut past short third man. But can't beat the fielder
good length on middle, and he flicks off the back foot to wide long on for a single
length ball on off, and that's been tapped with soft hands towards the empty mid-on region. Steketee scampers across after delivering the ball to clean up
Short on leg, and Short can't pull it away. The ball goes over his bat and into the keeper's gloves
full outside leg stump, and Short closes the bat's face to try and nudge it towards deep midwicket. But the ball misses the blade and hits his front leg
chipped just over short fine leg! Back of a length ball outside leg, and Short tried to ramp it over the infielder. But a top-edge takes it over him anyway

flies just over Heazlett's outstretched hands! Back of a length on middle, and he stays on the back foot to pull this over deep midwicket. Heazlett's riding the boundary and prepares to take the catch, but his dive was just not good enough
quick ball, length ball on middle and skidding through. Clipped away to deep midwicket
full on middle, and driven down the ground to long on! Struck hard, and long on can't cut it off
good length on middle, and he muscles a cut to mid off
full and wide outside off, and driven away from his body to cover
Swepson sees Short coming down the wicket, and he drops his length. Short is forced to adjust after skipping halfway down, and eventually nudges it with gentle hands towards the on-side
full and wide outside off, and Short tees up to drill a drive to wide long of. Raises his bat to acknowledge his seventh BBL fifty
back of a length on middle, and he swivels to pull! Takes the top-edge and it goes just past the keeper's left. Lucky for the batsman
full and wide outside off, and he muscles a cover drive to the fielder in the deep
wide yorker outside off stump. Short tries to ramp it over short third man, but he misses the shot. No harm done for Hobart, as the umpire calls it a wide anyway
slower ball, running his fingers over that delivery. Lands outside off, and he lines up to swing hard at this, but he misses the ball completely
slower ball again. Length ball just outside off, and he's deceived by the lack of pace. Tries to cut, but through his shot too early
attempted yorker just outside off stump. Short toe-ends a drive to long on. Cutting going at just six per over so far
down the ground, and into the stands! Full outside off, and he skips down the wicket, picks the wrong'un, and absolutely clatters this over long off
over long on now! Full-pitched from Swepson on middle, and Short goes leg side this time. Hammered over the fielder riding the boundary

back of a length outside leg stump, and he sweeps this to short fine leg. Lalor picks the ball up, has a shy at the keeper's stumps... and that's a run out! Lalor's left-handed throw landed just over the stumps, and McDermott hasn't yet reached the other end
length ball outside off, and cut to backward point
full outside leg stump, and he tries to slog towards the leg side. Hits his boot
length ball outside off stump, and cut off the back foot to Heazlett in the deep
full outside off, and spinning inwards. Tapped away towards the leg side
round the wicket to Short. Length ball skidding in, and he mistimes a leg-side shot off the back foot
length ball on off, and spinning into his pads. Nudged away to square leg
full on leg, and he sweeps to Lalor at short fine leg again. This time they manage to pinch the single
ramped over the keeper's left, but it doesn't have the legs to find the fine-leg boundary. Length ball on middle, and Bailey had adjusted to play the scoop behind him
full outside leg stump, and Short's down on one knee to sweep. The ball's through him, and the keeper can't hold on to it either! Freebies for Hobart
full and wide outside off stump. Defended towards Cutting at cover. Mujeeb finishes with 2 for 23

straight to cover! Length ball outside off, and he looks to cut square. Struck very well, but straight to Cutting near the circle. Short looks devastated. End of a tidy innings, but Hurricanes really needed him to bat through
full on off, and driven after shuffling across the stumps, to wide long on
low full toss right outside off stump, and he drills a straight drive to long on. Man on the boundary line there
back of a length outside off, and he rides the bounce to pull along the ground to deep midwicket
falls just short of cover! Slower ball, full outside off, and Bailey's attempted drive popped right in the air
length ball outside off, and angling inwards. Milenko backs away to tap a soft shot towards cover. Just four off that over
slower ball, full on off stump. Swings across the line, and mistimes a shot to deep backward square

just misses leg stump! Length ball on middle, and Milenko's walked down the wicket. Misses the leg-side swipe, and the ball goes through to the keeper on the bounce. But not before teasingly going past the stumps
full on leg stump, and he drills a drive to wide long on. But just a single
hammered over cover! Length ball outside off, and Bailey picks the slower ball (109 kph) early. Waits for the delivery to come to him, and them clatters a cut-shot over the head of cover
full and wide outside off, and he mistimes a toe-ended drive to long on
big appeal for caught behind but not given! It was a wide yorker that the batsman tried to ramp past point. Sound is of the bat hitting the ground, so that's a solid decision from the umpire
length ball on middle, and Bailey muscles a swipe-shot across the line to deep midwicket
back of a length outside off, and angling further away from the right hander. He looks to pull, but toe-ends the shot towards midwicket
that's the Natmeg! Yorker outside leg stumps, and Bailey opens his legs to play the french cut right through them! Runs away to the fine-leg boundary
slower ball, length ball outside off, and he waits for the ball to get to him before pulling over midwicket for four
sliced to wide long on! Length ball again, and this time the swipe towards the leg side has come off the bat's open face. In the air for ages, and the fielder comfortably completes the dismissal
length ball originating on off stump, and only angling further away. Left alone
full and fast outside off stump. Backs away to try and muscle a cover drive, but the ball whizzes past his outside edge

back of a length on middle stump as the batsman comes skipping down the wicket. Tries to nudge it past fine leg for four, but the ball takes a feather touch off his shirt and deposits itself into the keeper's gloves
full outside leg stump, wayward from Cutting. That's wide
full ball, wide outside off, and Faulkner tries to cut this behind square. Misses it completely, and he's on the ground
full and wide outside off, but Faulkner tees off nicely this time. Drills a straight drive over the non-striker's head to long on

whoa whoa whoa! Milenko tries to ramp this over the keeper's head, and adjusts his stance to do so, but the ball slips off Cutting's hand, and lands way beyond the batsman. Would've hit his head on the full if Milekno hadn't changed his stance. Free hit because of the beamer
full and wide outside off, so the free-hit stays
caught at wide long on but that's not out! Length ball outside off, and pulled right to the man at the boundar. All they can do is collect the single
yorker on middle, and that's been flicked off his boots to deep midwicket. Diving effort from Faulkner helps Hurricanes complete the second
full just outside off stump, almost a yorker. Mistimed to long on. A nine-ball over, but only eight from it!

Full outside off stump, and Faulkner swings across the line. Nice sound off the bat, but the square-boundary is pretty wide. Cutting gets under it near the boundary and takes a solid sliding catch near the ropes to send the man back
full on leg stump, and Milenko makes room to drive. Finds long on with that shot
he's broken his bat first ball! Back of a length outside off, and the square cut has ripped his bat in half
ooooh, that's a sweet shot! Back of a length outside off, but Milenko was waiting for it. Swivels to pull to the leg side, and the ball has soared over cow corner for half-a-dozen
full just outside off, and he tries to ramp this over the keeper. Misses completely, done in by the pace
golf swing right over long off! Full just outside off, and he clears his front leg to sweetly time this shot. Hurricanes finish on 159 for 6
length ball outside leg stump, and that's been flicked past the diving short fine-leg fielder. Comes back for the third as well
beautiful delivery! Length ball on middle stump, and angling away from Bryant after hitting the deck. Squares him up, but doesn't take the bat's outside edge
full outside leg stump, and some swing down the leg side forces the keeper to miss as well. The umpire says that's 'wide', almost the ball did hit the strap of Bryant's back leg
full on off stump, and Bryant looks to swing across the line. Struck well, but off the bat's inside half to short fine leg
full outside leg stump, and going down leg. Sharp take from Wade to ensure that there are no more free runs
good length on middle stump, and he looks to muscle this towards the leg side. Mistimed to square leg for a single
full on middle stump, and that's a firm front-foot defense from Baz. The ball dribbles back to Faulkner
full on middle, and driven to midwicket for a quick single. Archer cleans up

full just outside off stump, and pushed to cover with soft hands. Bryant's off for the single, but McCullum hasn't moved at all. Both batsmen are at the batting crease, and so Rose whips the bails off at his end. Bryant thinks he's out, but it's McCullum who's walking back. But the umpire will decide whose out. And he says McCullum
smashed over the bowler's head! Tossed up right outside off, and he takes a big stride forward to muscle this shot into the sightscreen
drilled to long on! Full on off again, and that's been clattered off the front foot. Straight as an arrow, and that's four more for Bryant
length ball on off, and he backs away to cut behind square. Stopped by point
full and wide outside off, and he lifts this - with the spin - right over cover! One-bounce four this time, and what an exquisite shot this is. Classical
full on middle, and Bryant clears his front leg to hammer a straight shot right over Rose again! Not as powerful as the previous shots, but hit straight enough to beat long on. Massive over.
length ball on off, and defended off the back foot towards the leg side
back of a length just outside off, and fended off the back foot to Archer. Super fast
full just outside off stump, and defended back to the bowler
back of a length on middle, and Lynn swivels to pull along the ground. But he inside-edges the shot onto his body. Ouch!
good length outside off stump, and Lynn opens the bat's face to steer a late cut past first slip! No one near the boundary, and that's four for Lynn

what pace, what bounce! Back of a length just outside off, and Lynn fishes outside off. The ball whizzes past his outside edge, and goes through to Wade. But the keeper has to stretch to his max to stop the ball from going for four

What. A. Shot! Full on middle, and Bryant gets under and over this ball! Allows the ball to come to him, and then golf-swings this right over Lynn's head! Not often that a batsman scores faster than Lynn or McCullum
back of the hand slower ball. Lands outside off, and tapped off the back foot to cover. Says 'no' to the run
back of the hand slower ball once again. Lands on off, and skids inwards. Defended off the back foot this time
slower ball again, back of a length outside off, and Bryant flat-bats a pull to long on
back of a length outside off, and Lynn tries to cut this behind square. But he's been deceived by the lack of pace
good length outside off stump, and he backs away to punch off the back foot. Dribbles away to cover
full and wide outside off, and Bryant plants his front foot to the pitch of the ball, and then hammers this right over cover's head. A couple of bounces for four
good length on middle, and tapped off the back foot to the leg side

what a screamer! Length ball outside leg stump, and he tries to paddle sweep fine. Hit well, but the fielder - at short fine leg - goes airborne towards his right, and the ball stays in his hand! A super innings comes to a close
good length outside off, and he plays the late cut to Rose at short third man
flicked off his hips so nonchalantly! Full and fast outside leg stump, but Lynn's bat speed sends this over the backward-square boundary. Raw power
back of a length on middle, and tapped back to Botha off the back foot
length ball on middle, and Burns can't flick it like he'd like. Mistimed to square leg off his pads
length ball on middle, and Lynn gets inside the line of the ball before punching to mid off for a single
full just outside off stump, and driven away from his body to cover. In the slot to be hit, but he splices that shot
good length on middle, and nudged off the back foot to long on. They walk across for one
short on off stump, and Lynn sways away from the line of this ball. Chooses not to engage with this
slower ball, full on middle. Driven with soft hands to mid off, but they can't pinch a single
length ball angling into his pads, and nudged with the spin to square leg for a walking single
full just outside off, and he check-drives past Botha's left to long off

full on off, and he looks to clear midwicket. Takes a big stride forward, swings the bat across the line, but he top-edges the shot right to long on. Doolan gets under it from long on, and comfortably takes the catch to send Joe Burns back
length ball on middle, and punched back to Botha. Faster from the experienced spinner
length ball on middle, and spinning into leg stump. Thumped off the back foot to long on for a walking single
full on middle, and he looks to drive down the ground. Off the bat's inside half, and it rolls back to the bowler
good length outside off, and he lines up to slap a cut shot. But misses it, and the ball goes to Wade on the bounce
full on leg stump, and comfortably begated by Lynn. Defended off the back foot to long on
great delivery! Fast, length ball on off stump and Heazlett looks to play the late cut. But too close to his body as the delivery whizzes past his outside edge
back of a length on middle, and he tries to ramp the slower ball over the keeper's head. But the ball goes over his shoulder and into Wade's gloves

clips middle stump! Almost unplayable from Meredith. Length ball on off, and nipped inwards after hitting the deck. Heazlett tries to drive towards the leg side, but the ball beats his inside-edge and takes the top of the stumps
full on leg stump, and nudged away to the vacant mid-wicket region. Cutting calls for the second run early, and that's been comfortably done
full on middle, and minimal spin from Rose. Driven back to the bowler
good lengt hon leg stump, and punched off the back foot to wide long on. Midwicket comes in from the ropes to intercept
full on middle, and defended back to Rose
length ball on middle stump, and nudged off the back foot to deep backward square
low full toss on middle stump, and driven with the angled bat to cover. But intercepted
good length on middle, and extra bounce reaches Cutting uncomfortably. Defended off the back foot to mid off, but for no run. A solid over from Rose, after the previous one that went for 18

dropped by Wade! Length ball on middle, but going down leg. He tried to pull behind square, but Cutting gloves the ball towards the keeper. But Wade just couldn't get it in the middle of his gloves, and that goes down as a missed opportunity
back of a length on leg stump, but Lynn backs away - exposing more than three stumps - and then flashes a cut shot right over point
full on leg stump, and tapped away to midwicket. Played gently for a single
back of a length outside off stump, and defended back to Meredith after riding the bounce
length ball outside off stump, and Lynn chooses to defend this away with gentle hands. Extra bounce forced Lynn to play this from near his face
Cutting hammers this for six! Back of a length on off, but Cutting swivels to top-edge a pull over cow corner. Not off the bat's middle, but it still had the legs to go 15 rows back. Heat needed that
full on middle, and he mistimes this towards the deep-midwicket fielder
length ball on middle stump, and flicked off the back foot to the vacant midwicket region. Rose gives it a chase, and ensures they can't pinch the second run
good length on off, and punched with the straight back to Rose. Well stopped
full on leg, but Lynn walks down the ground before driving to long off
length ball outside leg stump, and Cutting exposes all three stumps by walking towards the off side, and then flicks to square leg for a single
full on middle, and he walks down the ground to meet the ball on the full. Driven to long off
good length on off, and spinning away from Lynn. Flat-bats a pull to wide long off for a single
hammered over long on! It's a half-tracker on leg stump, and that's the kind of delivery Cutting likes. Stays on the back foot, sees the ball like a football, and then pulls right over long-on's head
length ball on middle, and spinning away from Cutting. He tries to muscle a pull again, but this time he toe-ends the shot to deep midwicket
length ball on middle, and pulled off the back foot to deep midwicket. Falls just before the boundary-rider there
sliced but falls safely! Back of a length outside off, and he flat-bats a pull once again. But Cutting has toe-ended the shot in the air this time
good length on middle, and nudged off the back foot to deep midwicket. Keeps strike
full just outside off, and spinning into the batsman. Driven back to Botha, pretty hard
full on leg stump, and tapped away - off his pads - to midwicket. Just a single, Botha won't mind
full just outside off stump, and Cutting exposes his stumps to nudge it towards square leg
good length outside off stump, and cut off the back foot to deep point. They walk across for a single
full just outside off stump, and worked away to deep midwicket for a walking single
full on middle stump, and driven down the ground to long on for a single
back of a length outside off, and he misses out on the cut! Ball stays low, and Lynn is not happy that it's a dot

screamer at long on! Lynn goes and Hurricanes will feel they're ahead now. Length ball outside off stump, and he muscles a flat-batted pull down the ground. But a sliding catch from Doolan has brought Lynn's really slow innings to an end
back of a length outside off stump, and he walks across to the off side before paddling a sweep past backward square for four! Exquisite shot
slower ball, very full outside off stump. Lands near the tram-lines and steers a shot to cover for a single
full and wide outside off stump, and driven away from his body to deep extra cover. They walk across for a single
low full toss outside off stump, and he plays a square drive with the angled bat. stopped at point
full just outside off stump, and tapped off the back foot to wide mid on. Nobody there, so Botha must run across to intercept
muscled! Full on off, and Cutting settles down on one knee before swinging across the line to the long-on boundary
full and wide outside off stump, and this goes under Cutting's bat as he tries to drive through the covers. Close to the wide-line, but the umpire thinks that's perfectly legal
full and wide outside off stump, and he gets down on one knee to swing across the line. Flat-bats a shot to Doolan at long on for a single
full outside off stump, and he walks down the ground before tapping a shot to long on
full on leg stump, and nudged off his toes to wide long on. Eleven off the over
full on middle stump, and nudged away to deep midwicket for a single. But importantly hands the strike back to Cutting
full and wide outside off, and Cutting wedges his bat down into the pitch to try and steer this fine. Played to third man
that's a big one! Full on off, and Cutting manages to get under this delivery. Off the bat's sweet spot, and soaring into the long-on boundary
good comeback from Archer. Short on off, and too fast for Cutting as he tries to pull
toecrusher from Archer that Cutting can't get bat on ball. Overpitched just outside off, and the ball goes under Cutting's bat
full toss on middle, and Cutting will keep strike. Shuffles across to nudge this square to deep midwicket
full toss on off, and driven beautifully past the bowler's left to the long-off boundary! Just the start Heat wanted. Cutting manages to muscle this
full, but very very wide from Meredith. Cutting lets it go and collects the extra run
full outside off stump, and he backs away to cut. Cutting misses completely. Super fast from Meredith, and he isn't happy with the umpire's call
helicopter shot over long on! And that's his 100th T20 six. What a classy way to earn your maiden BBL fifty! Full on middle stump, and Cutting uses his bottom hand to deposit a maximum
Cutting backs away to make some room, and Meredith bowls wide outside off. Forces the batsman to reach at it, and he mistimes the shot to point
bowled 'im! A sedate celebration from Meredith. Full on middle and leg, and the ball hits Pierson's pads before ricocheting onto the stumps
back of a length on off, and he backs away to hammer a shot into the ground. The ball bounces away to cover
full and wide outside off stump, and Cutting simply opens the bat's face to run this down to third man. He'll keep strike again
full and straight, and Cutting drills a straight drive. Work for long on, but he slides to cut the boundary off
low full toss just outside off, and he slaps this towards point. Lands just short of Faulkner and the ball pops off his body to cover
holes out! Almost a yorker on middle, and Cutting looks to clear long off. But he check-drives this shot, and the easiest of catches for the former Hurricanes captain Bailey
back of a length outside off, and Steketee backs away to try and cut this over point. Slices the shot, and that's soaring into third-man's hands! Is that the final blow? Archer on a hat-trick too.
length ball just outside off stump, and Lalor backs away before slapping a cut shot over point! Almost goes for a six! That's what Heat need. Nineteen off seven now
dot ball to end the over. Short ball outside off, but Lalor followed the delivery. Eventually ducks under the ball, and the umpire has said that's a legal delivery
length ball outside off, and he slaps a cut shot over point. Lands in no man's land as deep extra cover attacks the ball
length ball outside off stump, and he goes onto the back foot to pull over long on. Off the bat's top half and that's going straight down long-on's throat
goes for the wide yorker, and he's missed his line. Too wide, according to the umpire
swing and a miss. Full outside off, and Lalor tries to swing across the line. No contact
full just outside off stump, and he toe-ends a slog. In the air for ages, and long on takes the catch! Hobart Hurricanes win by 15 runs
